doc:
Michael Spilotro https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_Spilotro 0 Michael Peter "Micky" Spilotro (September 12, 1944 – June 14, 1986) was the younger brother of Anthony "Tony the Ant" Spilotro and was an associate of the Chicago organized crime organization referred to as "The Outfit". Michael_Peter_"_Micky_"_Spilotro ( September_12_,_1944 – June_14_,_1986 ) was the_younger_brother of Anthony " Tony the_Ant_"_Spilotro and was an_associate of the_Chicago_organized_crime_organization referred to as " The_Outfit_" .
